message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on this unique item, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $9000 for it. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand that $12000 might be a stretch for you, Bob. However, I'm still confident that the product is worth a premium price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. This is a fair price considering the value it can bring to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $10500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $9500 for the product. Can you consider that price?

I understand that $10500 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer it to you for $10200. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and my costs.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $10200 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $9800 for the product. Can you consider that price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $10100. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

I understand that you're willing to make one more concession, but $10100 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $9500 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.

I'm surprised you're willing to go as low as $9500, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'll offer it to you for $9700. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
